verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh have you been to Avondale And wandered in the lovely vale Where tall trees whisper all the tale Of Avondale's proud eagle

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Where fame and ancient glory fate Such was the land where he was laid Like Christ was thirty pieces paid For Avondale's proud eagle

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Long years that green and lovely vale Has nursed Parnell, our grandest Gael And cursed the land that has betrayed Fair Avondale's proud eagle
